Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays congestion following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at O'Hare. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays congestion following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at O'Hare.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
